suite.name: Provision-Containers

kw.name: Run Keywords
kw.doc: Executes all the given keywords in a sequence.

kw.name: Stx Suite Setup
kw.doc: Wrapper to setup the environment needed for exercise StarlingX features

kw.name: Open Master Controller Connection
kw.doc: Establish a SSH connection with the master controller to start executing the the suite.

kw.name: Connect to Controller Node
kw.doc: Stablish a SSH connection to the controller and return the connection id

kw.name: Open Connection
kw.doc: Opens a new SSH connection to the given ``host`` and ``port``.

kw.name: Flexible_SSH_Login
kw.doc: On active SSH session: if given non-empty password, do Login, else do Login With Public Key.

kw.name: Get Length
kw.doc: Returns and logs the length of the given item as an integer.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Return If
kw.doc: Runs the specified keyword and returns from the enclosing user keyword.

kw.name: Login
kw.doc: Logs into the SSH server with the given ``username`` and ``password``.
kw.msg:
Read output: Last login: Tue Apr 2 12:33:15 2019 from 192.168.200.60 /etc/motd.d/00-header:
[H[2J WARNING: Unauthorized access to this system is forbidden and will be prosecuted by law. By accessing this system, you agree that your actions may be monitored if unauthorized usage is suspected.
controller-0:~$

/home/mgperezi/duplex/stx-test-suite/Maria/lib/python2.7/site-packages/paramiko/kex_ecdh_nist.py:39: CryptographyDeprecationWarning: encode_point has been deprecated on EllipticCurvePublicNumbers and will be removed in a future version. Please use EllipticCurvePublicKey.public_bytes to obtain both compressed and uncompressed point encoding. m.add_string(self.Q_C.public_numbers().encode_point()) /home/mgperezi/duplex/stx-test-suite/Maria/lib/python2.7/site-packages/paramiko/kex_ecdh_nist.py:96: CryptographyDeprecationWarning: Support for unsafe construction of public numbers from encoded data will be removed in a future version. Please use EllipticCurvePublicKey.from_encoded_point self.curve, Q_S_bytes /home/mgperezi/duplex/stx-test-suite/Maria/lib/python2.7/site-packages/paramiko/kex_ecdh_nist.py:111: CryptographyDeprecationWarning: encode_point has been deprecated on EllipticCurvePublicNumbers and will be removed in a future version. Please use EllipticCurvePublicKey.public_bytes to obtain both compressed and uncompressed point encoding. hm.add_string(self.Q_C.public_numbers().encode_point())
Returning from the enclosing user keyword.

kw.name: Set Suite Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current suite.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Set Env Vars From Openrc
kw.doc: Sources the openrc form /etc/nova/ to have the admin variables exported on the controller.

kw.name: Run Command
kw.doc: Execute a command on controller over ssh connection keeping environment visible to the subsequent keywords.Also allows the keyword to fail if there is an error, by default this keyword will not fail and will return the stderr.

kw.name: Set Client Configuration
kw.doc: Update the `configuration` of the current connection.

kw.name: Create Empy Result Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates an Empty Dictionary with the required structure for a response of executed command.

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: Set To Dictionary
kw.doc: Adds the given ``key_value_pairs`` and ``items`` to the ``dictionary``.

kw.name: Set To Dictionary
kw.doc: Adds the given ``key_value_pairs`` and ``items`` to the ``dictionary``.

kw.name: Read
kw.doc: Consumes and returns everything available on the server output.

kw.name: Write
kw.doc: Writes the given ``text`` on the remote machine and appends a newline.

kw.name: Read Until Prompt
kw.doc: Consumes and returns the server output until the prompt is found.

kw.name: Remove Prompt Line
kw.doc: On the response of the command execution is also retrieved the prompt line (because the use of Read until prompt) this keyword delete that last line and returns a clean output.

kw.name: Get Line
kw.doc: Returns the specified line from the given ``string``.

kw.name: Remove String
kw.doc: Removes all ``removables`` from the given ``string``.

kw.name: Get Return Code
kw.doc: Wrapper to return the code number of last executed command

kw.name: Write
kw.doc: Writes the given ``text`` on the remote machine and appends a newline.

kw.name: Read Until Regexp
kw.doc: Consumes and returns the server output until a match to ``regexp`` is found.

kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.doc: Adds the given ``key_value_pairs`` and ``items`` to the ``dictionary``.

kw.doc: Adds the given ``key_value_pairs`` and ``items`` to the ``dictionary``.

test.doc: Validates provisioning of a duplex configuration according to steps defined at "https://wiki.openstack.org/wiki/StarlingX/Containers/ InstallationOnAIODX"
test.status: DataNetwork of name physnet0 already exists.

suite.doc: Tests for provisioning and unlocking controllers, computes and storage hosts. Author(s): - Jose Perez Carranza <jose.perez.carranza@intel.com> - Juan Carlos Alonso <juan.carlos.alonso@intel.com>
